Name: Student Solutions Manual for College Physics

ReviewList.Text: I purchased this solutions manual with the hopes of practicing all of the problems at the end of each chapter in the College Physics text book--unfortunately, this solutions manual doesn't provide ANY answers to the conceptual or multiple choice problems.  Instead, it only provides answers to SOME of the odd numbered problems, and these answers are already provided in the back of the College Physics text book (although not with as much detail as the solutions manual).  Doesn't this defeat a good portion of the purpose of a solutions manual?

Don't waste your money!  It does not have all the solutions.  It does not even have all the odd solutions or all the even solutions.  It has selected odd problems.  I am halfway through physics 2 and have used this manual maybe 2 times between both Physics 1 and 2.  It just doesn't have the problems I need and the problems I did need help with (that were included in this manual) were explained  in a way I do not find helpful.  Go to chegg. Your money will be much better spent getting access to the solutions there.

I'm highly annoyed that this solutions manual doesn't contain solutions to all the problems. That's sort of the point of a solutions manual, teaching you how to solve the problems you're having difficulty with step-by-step when you can't get to your professor. I'd pay more for a complete manual. What the hell is wrong with you authors?
This book is a huge help. It has every other problem just like the text book but this book shows you the steps to get that answer. Great buy!
This does not help whatsoever:( I would love to get a refund, but I am sure that is not going to happen. This was a waist of money.
There are not nearly enough of the solutions to the book problems in this book to make it worth the price.
